completedItems.title: fix: tts api
completedItems.body: This PR addresses an issue where plugin-openai TTS wasn't working because it returns a Web ReadableStream. The fix properly handles all types of stream responses for TTS APIs

completedItems.title: fix: cli start agent
completedItems.body: Currently, when a file path is provided to start an agent with cli, the agent gets created but doesn't automatically start.
